title: Egypt’s National Elections Authority to hold press conference, Monday
author: Rahman Ali
content: The National Elections Authority announced holding a press conference, Monday at 4:00 PM at the Authority's headquarters to announce all details related to the first phase of the elections and what has been accomplished in implementation of the directives of President Abdel Fattah El-Sisi.
excerpt: The National Elections Authority announced holding a press conference, Monday at 4:00 PM at the Authority's headquarters.

title: Portugal qualify for World Cup with 9-1 thrashing of Armenia
author: Karim Hasan
content: Portugal's national football team has qualified for the World Cup after a stunning 9-1 victory over Armenia in the qualifying match.
excerpt: Portugal's national football team has qualified for the World Cup after a stunning 9-1 victory over Armenia.

title: Four Star Films Brings Edgar Wright’s Electrifying
author: Fatima Ahmed
content: Artificial intelligence technology is opening new doors of possibilities worldwide. Researchers say this technology will bring about radical changes in our way of life in the next decade.
excerpt: Artificial intelligence technology is opening new doors of possibilities worldwide.

title: Egypt Today Magazine Cover Of ‘Lahzet Ghadab’ Series Wins International
author: Tania Rahman
content: Youmna, a cook, suffers from the control of her narcissistic husband Sherif over everything.
excerpt: Youmna, a cook, suffers from the control of her narcissistic husband Sherif over everything. A sudden moment of anger pushes Youmna to Kill Sherif by accident

title: Dawlet El Telawa Opens Strong with Intense Eliminations
author: Imran Hossain
content: The highly anticipated Quran recitation competition Dawlet El Telawa launched its debut episode this Friday with a powerful start, presenting a lineup of exceptional talents and a dramatic elimination round that immediately captivated viewers. The program, which airs every Friday and Saturday on Al-Hayah, CBC, Al-Nas, and the Watch It platform, aims to discover a new generation of standout voices in Quran recitation and tajweed.
excerpt: The highly anticipated Quran recitation competition Dawlet El Telawa launched its debut episode this Friday with a powerful start.

title: Hussein Fahmy at CIFF 46: “Celebrating Egypt’s Art, Cinema, and a New Era”
author: Najma Khatun
content: Under the Digital Bangladesh project, ten million new people in the country have come under internet facilities. This milestone marks a significant step towards achieving a fully digital society, enhancing connectivity and access to information for millions of citizens.
excerpt: Under the Digital Bangladesh project, ten million new people in the country have come under internet facilities.

title: New Project Launched to Improve Healthcare Nationwide
author: Dr. Rasheda Islam
content: The government has launched a new project to improve healthcare services across the country. Through this project, people in remote areas will also gain access to better healthcare.
excerpt: The government has launched a new project to improve healthcare services across the country.

title: New Opportunities for Bangladeshi Entrepreneurs
author: Mahmud Hasan
content: New opportunities have emerged in the international market for Bangladeshi entrepreneurs. New projects have been launched with the aim of boosting exports through government and private initiatives.
excerpt: New opportunities have emerged in the international market for Bangladeshi entrepreneurs.

title: Four International Golf Tournaments to Launch in Egypt Next Year
author: Riyad Karim
content: Four international golf tournaments are set to launch in Egypt next year, attracting top players from around the world. This initiative aims to promote Egypt as a premier golf destination.
excerpt: Four international golf tournaments are set to launch in Egypt next year.

title: Cairo International Film Festival grants veteran
author: Shamima Akter
content: The government has taken a new initiative to preserve Bangladesh’s rich culture and heritage. Under this initiative, the ancient cultural assets of the country will be protected.
excerpt: The government has taken a new initiative to preserve Bangladesh’s rich culture and heritage.

title: New Progress in Smart City Project
author: Ariful Islam
content: Under the Smart City Project, development work in Dhaka is accelerating through the use of new technologies. This project will make urban life much easier for citizens.
excerpt: Under the Smart City Project, development work in Dhaka is accelerating through the use of new technologies.

title: New Steps to Improve International Relations
author: Tahmida Rahman
content: Bangladesh has taken new steps to strengthen bilateral relations with various countries. This initiative will help improve trade and diplomatic relations.
excerpt: Bangladesh has taken new steps to strengthen bilateral relations with various countries.

title: Relatives of Mohamed Saber Ramadan Nasr Deif Allah
author: Imran Hossain
content: Relatives of Mohamed Saber Ramadan Nasr Deif Allah A.K.A Muhammad Saber Ramadan Nasr A.K.A. Mohammad Ahmed (45), commander of the Al-Furkan militant group, have held a protest in Giza on the anniversary of his death. He was executed in 2020. His family says he was killed without any evidence. He has been held on custody since 2016, along with thousands of others, as a militant commander. his Case No. 631 of 2019 State Security.
excerpt: The highly anticipated Quran recitation competition Dawlet El Telawa launched its debut episode this Friday with a powerful start.
